verses.verse: Moreover the spirit <WH7307> lifted me up <WH5375> <WH8799>, and brought <WH935> <WH8686> me unto the east <WH6931> gate <WH8179> of the YY'S <WH3068> house <WH1004>, which looketh <WH6437> <WH8802> eastward <WH6921>: and behold at the door <WH6607> of the gate <WH8179> five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> men <WH376>; among <WH8432> whom I saw <WH7200> <WH8799> Jaazaniah <WH2970> the son <WH1121> of Azur <WH5809>, and Pelatiah <WH6410> the son <WH1121> of Benaiah <WH1141>, princes <WH8269> of the people <WH5971>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> he unto me, Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, these are the men <WH582> that devise <WH2803> <WH8802> mischief <WH205>, and give <WH3289> <WH8802> wicked <WH7451> counsel <WH6098> in this city <WH5892>:
Which say <WH559> <WH8802>, It is not near <WH7138>; let us build <WH1129> <WH8800> houses <WH1004>: this city is the caldron <WH5518>, and we be the flesh <WH1320>.
Therefore prophesy <WH5012> <WH8734> against them, prophesy <WH5012> <WH8734>, O son <WH1121> of man <WH120>.

And the Spirit <WH7307> of the YY <WH3068> fell <WH5307> <WH8799> upon me, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Speak <WH559> <WH8798>; Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>; Thus have ye said <WH559> <WH8799>, O house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: for I know <WH3045> <WH8804> the things that come <WH4609> into your mind <WH7307>, every one of them.
Ye have multiplied <WH7235> <WH8689> your slain <WH2491> in this city <WH5892>, and ye have filled <WH4390> <WH8765> the streets <WH2351> thereof with the slain <WH2491>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Your slain <WH2491> whom ye have laid <WH7760> <WH8804> in the midst <WH8432> of it, they are the flesh <WH1320>, and this city is the caldron <WH5518>: but I will bring you forth <WH3318> <WH8689> out of the midst <WH8432> of it.
Ye have feared <WH3372> <WH8804> the sword <WH2719>; and I will bring <WH935> <WH8686> a sword <WH2719> upon you, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

And I will bring you out <WH3318> <WH8689> of the midst <WH8432> thereof, and deliver <WH5414> <WH8804> you into the hands <WH3027> of strangers <WH2114> <WH8801>, and will execute <WH6213> <WH8804> judgments <WH8201> among you.
Ye shall fall <WH5307> <WH8799> by the sword <WH2719>; I will judge <WH8199> <WH8799> you in the border <WH1366> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; and ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.
This city shall not be your caldron <WH5518>, neither shall ye be the flesh <WH1320> in the midst <WH8432> thereof; but I will judge <WH8199> <WH8799> you in the border <WH1366> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>:

And ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>: for ye have not walked <WH1980> <WH8804> in my statutes <WH2706>, neither executed <WH6213> <WH8804> my judgments <WH4941>, but have done <WH6213> <WH8804> after the manners <WH4941> of the heathen <WH1471> that are round about <WH5439> you.

And it came to pass, when I prophesied <WH5012> <WH8736>, that Pelatiah <WH6410> the son <WH1121> of Benaiah <WH1141> died <WH4191> <WH8804>. Then fell I down <WH5307> <WH8799> upon my face <WH6440>, and cried <WH2199> <WH8799> with a loud <WH1419> voice <WH6963>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Ah <WH162> YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069> ! wilt thou make <WH6213> <WH8802> a full end <WH3617> of the remnant <WH7611> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> ?
Again the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, thy brethren <WH251>, even thy brethren <WH251>, the men <WH582> of thy kindred <WH1353>, and all the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> wholly, are they unto whom the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Yerushalayim <WH3389> have said <WH559> <WH8804>, Get you far <WH7368> <WH8798> from the YY <WH3068>: unto us is this land <WH776> given <WH5414> <WH8738> in possession <WH4181>.

Therefore say <WH559> <WH8798>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Although I have cast them far off <WH7368> <WH8689> among the heathen <WH1471>, and although I have scattered <WH6327> <WH8689> them among the countries <WH776>, yet will I be to them as a little <WH4592> sanctuary <WH4720> in the countries <WH776> where they shall come <WH935> <WH8804>.

Therefore say <WH559> <WH8798>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; I will even gather <WH6908> <WH8765> you from the people <WH5971>, and assemble <WH622> <WH8804> you out of the countries <WH776> where ye have been scattered <WH6327> <WH8738>, and I will give <WH5414> <WH8804> you the land <WH127> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
And they shall come <WH935> <WH8804> thither, and they shall take away <WH5493> <WH8689> all the detestable things <WH8251> thereof and all the abominations <WH8441> thereof from thence.

And I will give <WH5414> <WH8804> them one <WH259> heart <WH3820>, and I will put <WH5414> <WH8799> a new <WH2319> spirit <WH7307> within <WH7130> you; and I will take <WH5493> <WH8689> the stony <WH68> heart <WH3820> out of their flesh <WH1320>, and will give <WH5414> <WH8804> them an heart <WH3820> of flesh <WH1320>:

That they may walk <WH3212> <WH8799> in my statutes <WH2708>, and keep <WH8104> <WH8799> mine ordinances <WH4941>, and do <WH6213> <WH8804> them: and they shall be my people <WH5971>, and I will be their 'Elohim <WH430>.

But as for them whose heart <WH3820> walketh <WH1980> <WH8802> after the heart <WH3820> of their detestable things <WH8251> and their abominations <WH8441>, I will recompense <WH5414> <WH8804> their way <WH1870> upon their own heads <WH7218>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

Then did the cherubims <WH3742> lift up <WH5375> <WH8799> their wings <WH3671>, and the wheels <WH212> beside <WH5980> them; and the glory <WH3519> of the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> was over them above <WH4605>.

And the glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068> went up <WH5927> <WH8799> from the midst <WH8432> of the city <WH5892>, and stood <WH5975> <WH8799> upon the mountain <WH2022> which is on the east side <WH6924> of the city <WH5892>.

Afterwards the spirit <WH7307> took me up <WH5375> <WH8804>, and brought <WH935> <WH8686> me in a vision <WH4758> by the Spirit <WH7307> of 'Elohim <WH430> into Chaldea <WH3778>, to them of the captivity <WH1473>. So the vision <WH4758> that I had seen <WH7200> <WH8804> went up <WH5927> <WH8799> from me.
Then I spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto them of the captivity <WH1473> all the things <WH1697> that the YY <WH3068> had shewed <WH7200> <WH8689> me.
